verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H6509><s%> "Be fruitful, and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and replenish <S%H4390><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The fear of you <S%H4172><s%> and the dread of you <S%H2844><s%> will be on every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and on every bird <S%H5775><s%> of the sky. <S%H8064><s%> Everything that the ground <S%H127><s%> teems <S%H7430><s%> with, <S%H1709><s%> and all the fish of the sea <S%H3220><s%> are delivered <S%H5414><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>
Every moving thing <S%H7431><s%> that lives <S%H2416><s%> will be food <S%H402><s%> for you. <S%H3418><s%> As the green herb, <S%H6212><s%> I have given everything to you. <S%H5414><s%>
But <S%H389><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> with its life, <S%H5315><s%> its blood, <S%H1818><s%> you shall not eat. <S%H398><s%>

I will surely <S%H389><s%> require <S%H1875><s%> your blood <S%H1818><s%> of your lives. <S%H5315><s%> At the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every animal <S%H2416><s%> I will require <S%H1875><s%> it. <S%H3027><s%> At the hand of man, <S%H120><s%> even at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every man <S%H120><s%>'s brother, <S%H251><s%> I will require <S%H1875><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of man. <S%H120><s%>

Whoever sheds <S%H8210><s%> man <S%H120><s%>'s blood, <S%H1818><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> will be shed <S%H8210><s%> by man, <S%H120><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in his own image. <S%H6754><s%>
Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply. <S%H7235><s%> Increase abundantly <S%H8317><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and multiply in it. <S%H7235><s%>"
God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Noah <S%H5146><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, <S%H559><s%> saying,
"As for me, <S%H6965><s%> behold, I establish my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, <S%H2233><s%> and with your offspring after you, <S%H310><s%>

and with every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you: <S%H5775><s%> the birds, the livestock, <S%H2416><s%> and every animal of the earth <S%H776><s%> with you, <S%H3318><s%> of all that go out of the ship, <S%H8392><s%> even every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you: <S%H1320><s%> all flesh will not be cut off <S%H3772><s%> any more by the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the flood, <S%H3999><s%> neither will there ever again be a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I <S%H589><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> between me and you and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you, <S%H5769><s%> for perpetual generations: <S%H1755><s%>
I set <S%H5414><s%> my rainbow <S%H7198><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and it will be for a sign <S%H226><s%> of a covenant <S%H1285><s%> between me and the earth. <S%H776><s%>
It will happen, <S%H6049><s%> when I bring a cloud <S%H6051><s%> over the earth, <S%H776><s%> that the rainbow <S%H7198><s%> will be seen <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%>

and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which is between me and you and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> will no more <S%H5750><s%> become a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> all flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

The rainbow <S%H7198><s%> will be in the cloud. <S%H6051><s%> I will look at it, <S%H7200><s%> that I may remember <S%H2142><s%> the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and <S%H996><s%> every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> "This is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I have established <S%H6965><s%> between me and all flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> who went out <S%H3318><s%> from the ship <S%H8392><s%> were Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%> Ham <S%H2526><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
These <S%H5146><s%> three <S%H2490><s%> were the sons of <S%H376><s%> Noah, <S%H776><s%> and from these, the whole earth was populated. <S%H5310><s%>
Noah <S%H5146><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to be a farmer, <S%H376><s%> and planted <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard. <S%H3754><s%>
He drank <S%H8354><s%> of the wine <S%H3196><s%> and got drunk. <S%H7937><s%> He was uncovered <S%H1540><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> his tent. <S%H168><s%>

Ham, <S%H2526><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>

Shem <S%H8035><s%> and Japheth <S%H3315><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a garment, <S%H8071><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> it on both <S%H8147><s%> their shoulders, <S%H7926><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> in backwards, <S%H3680><s%> and covered the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of their father. <S%H1><s%> Their faces <S%H6440><s%> were backwards, <S%H322><s%> and they didn't <S%H7200><s%> see their father <S%H1><s%>'s nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
Noah <S%H5146><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%> from his wine, <S%H3196><s%> and knew <S%H3045><s%> what his youngest <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> had done to him. <S%H6213><s%>
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Canaan <S%H3667><s%> is cursed. <S%H779><s%> He will be servant <S%H5650><s%> of servants <S%H5650><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Shem. <S%H8035><s%> Let Canaan <S%H3667><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> his servant. <S%H5650><s%>
May God <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H6601><s%> Japheth. <S%H3315><s%> Let him dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of Shem. <S%H8035><s%> Let Canaan <S%H3667><s%> be his servant. <S%H5650><s%>"
Noah <S%H5146><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
